    • acceptMessage

      public AMessage acceptMessage(AMessage msg)
      Process a message received by the TFinder agent, by returning an appropriate answer This version only process answers to moveto and detectsat messages
      Parameters:
      msg - message sent by the Agent
      Returns:
      a msg with the answer to return to the agent

    • treasureInCorners

      private boolean treasureInCorners(int x, int y)
      Given a position in the world checks if the treasure is located in the corners around x y
      Parameters:
      x - position x in the world
      y - position y in the world
      Returns:
      true if is in the corners, else false

    • withinLimits

      public boolean withinLimits(int x, int y)
      Check if position x,y is within the limits of the WorldDim x WorldDim world
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of agent position
      y - y coordinate of agent position
      Returns:
      true if (x,y) is within the limits of the world
